entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cannot get cross-targeting to work w/Native AOT #88971
  • DI behavior change between .NET 7.0 and .NET 8.0 #88968
  • [API Proposal]: Ship IPNetwork downlevel for netstandard2.0 #88965
    8.0.0
  • IDynamicInterfaceCastable throws EntryPointNotFoundException when calling a generic method #88964
  • Improve ArraySegment debugging #88961
  • `Loader/classloader/InlineArray/InlineArrayValid.cs` need to be updated to work with latest roslyn #88957

Closed

  • Static interface implementation bug #79603
  • [API Proposal]: Add a type to represent IP networks based on CIDR notation #79946
    8.0.0
  • Authentication validation failed with error - InvalidToken exception on .net 7 and .net 8 preview 6 #88874
    8.0.0
  • Once HttpClient.DefaultProxy is accessed, it will not be updated again. #88409
    8.0.0
  • Using SocketsHttpHandler over HttpClientHandler #88834
    8.0.0
  • Invalid codegen with Unsafe.As on FullOpts when accessing a struct field through ulong->struct cast. #88950
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Poc: add SendTo/ReceiveFrom with SocketAddress #88970
    area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix Globalization Tests #88969
    area-System.Globalization, 8.0.0
  • JSON: Add support for Int128, UInt128 and Half… #88962
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0

Merged

  • [RISC-V] Fix GitHub_* tests #88640
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fix behavior of default interfaces interacting with constraints #88932
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Fix `TimeZoneInfo.Equals` and `TimeZoneInfo.HasSameRules` #88869
    community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • Improve Logger<T> debugging #88959
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Improve StringValues, StringSegment and IChangeToken debugging #88960
    area-Extensions-Primitives, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2222942 #88935
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Optimize scalar conversions with AVX512 #84384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [Mono]: Add dotnet-gcdump support. #88634
    area-Tracing-mono
  • Fix SelectLocalIndirTransform to take offset into account #88951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Enable ExtendedProtectionPolicy in generic System.Net.Security build #88871
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • [WASM][WIP] Add ILStrip task to wasm app build process #88926
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Intrinsify Unsafe.Read/Write/Copy, handle struct BitCast #85562
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Optimize nullcheck for Interlocked.* operations #87297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • #78303 Add transformation ~v1 & v2 to VectorXxx.AndNot(v1, v2) #81993
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use proper context in initClass for GDV #87847
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][tests] Parallel AOT compilation of runtime tests on iOS platforms #86089
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] Skip RC2 encrypted PKCS12 files on Android for iteration counting #88854
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, test-bug
  • [libs][iOS] Unify `System.Linq.Expression.dll` build for all platforms #88723
    area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • Add Capacity property and overloaded TrimExcess #85877
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V][JIT] Fix DevDiv_718151 test #88404
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [mono] Some UnsafeAccessorAttribute support for methods and constructors #88925
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [ios][tests] Run the Mono and Native AOT iOS samples as functional tests on Helix #87773
    blocked, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Light up core ASCII.CaseConversion methods with Vector256/Vector512 code paths #88923
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [mono][interp] Fix memory leaks for interpreted dynamic methods. #88892
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Expose the left-handed matrix creation APIs #88930
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Extend SocketsHttpHandler Connection and Request telemetry #88853
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Mark final types as exact #88163
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Register a callback that tries to load other versions Open LDAP library if the default is failed #88851
    area-System.DirectoryServices
  • [IGNORE][wasm] testing wbt changes #88370
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [WIP] Improve `File.Copy` by using the block copy operation for ReFS on Windows #88695
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Add package readme for System.Net.Http #88911
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Added QuicException.TransportErrorCode #88550
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Optimize const ShiftRightLogical for byte values on XArch #86841
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix HTTP/1.1 concurrent request content read race condition #86715
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Remove ThunkPool crst. #88778
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser] Allow download retry+throttling in unified code with blazor #88910
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Documentation for options of code-style rules is incorrect/misleading #69056

PullRequests

Created

  • Detect rude edits in trivia-only changes #69059
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Move CollectionLiteralTests.cs to Emit2 #69058
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.7 to main #69060
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Port 68919 to 17.7 #69045
    Area-Compilers, OnDeckForQB, 17.7 P5

Updated

  • Add 'priority' concept to our code actions, and code refactoring/fix providers. #68511
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection literals: collection builder methods #68930
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Pc active statements #69028
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Move several value types over to being records #68956
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: json #49451
  • [API Proposal]: Allow to configure the login path in Identity #49450
  • Code duplication between `IdentityServiceCollectionExtensions` and `IdentityCookiesBuilderExtensions` #49449
  • How to persist data on Blazor SSR + WASM Client in .NET 8 preview 6 #49448
  • Blazor page does not display with SVG #49447
  • Cannot select .net 8 preview 6 in Blazor Server even though installed. #49446
  • Detect invalid route such as `@page "/fhir{system}" in Blazor component #49445
  • Perf improvement: single_query #49444
  • Leading @ should not be required in attribute value when specifying render mode using @rendermode #49443
  • Triggering an event callback in OnValidSubmit for a form causes the form to not be reset #49442

Closed

  • Loading multiple RCL projects (Module1, Module2) that share a common RCL (Common) project into a BlazorWasm client that also references this shared RCL (Common) #49435
  • IFormFileCollection minimal api behave different from mvc controller #49437
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #49439
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, plainTextEmptyFilter #49396
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #49438

PullRequests

Updated

  • [Blazor] Improvements to the interaction between SSR and interactive rendering #49238
    area-blazor
  • Option to use JsonWebTokenHandler in oidc handler #49333
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Update JwtBearer and WsFederation to use updated IdentityModel #48966
    area-security
  • Adding QuickGridC component to QuickGrid library #49427
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • [SignalR] Harden MessageBuffer #49423
    area-signalr

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Linux support #16183
  • x:Name in any Element inside CollectionView not recognized in code-behind. #16182
  • Mouse scroll on 'X' closes application #16179

PullRequests

Merged

  • Windows (packaged) Device tests for CI #15629
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, area/testing

Updated

  • Use base Width and Height on Android PlatformGraphicsView #15721
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨
  • Implement rate for TextToSpeech on supported platforms #15528
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale
  • Android Ecosystem 20230714 net8.0 nuget bumps fix issue 16074 type renaming #16177
  • Android Ecosystem 20230714 net7.0 nuget bumps fix issue 16074 type renaming #16176
  • Prevent refresh command from executing when CanExecute is false #16090
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-refreshview
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #16033
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Query: incorrect results for queries projecting collections with distinct/group by, where we use projection as identifiers and all the columns are nullable #31277

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix typo in RelationalStrings.resx #31278

Updated

  • Add infrastructure for trimming and NativeAOT test apps. #31274
  • Fix to #30922 - Most cases of projecting a primitive collection don't work #31263
